title: Triple crossbow
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Triple crossbow |weight = N/A |skill = Ranged Weapons |damage = 23 |accuracy = -2 |basedelay = 23 |mindelay = 10 at 26 skill |hands = 2H |size = Medium |damtype = ? |ranged = Yes |acquirement = 2 }} {{flavour|A crossbow with three strings arranged in series to provide exceptional power, initially designed as a siege weapon and then scaled down. It takes a considerable amount of time to load and fire. ---- "Energy may be likened to the bending of a crossbow;
decision, to the releasing of a trigger." -Sun Tzu}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Ranged Weapons]]' category. It is a two-handed weapon}} The '''triple crossbow''' is a phenomenally powerful [[ranged weapon]]; at 23 base damage, it has the highest base damage of ''any'' weapon in the game. However, it's also one of the slowest weapons in the game: with a base delay of 2.3, it takes a whopping 26 skill in [[Ranged Weapons]] to reduce its attack speed to its mindelay of 1.0. Until you get close to that point, you'll likely get much better performance out of a [[longbow]] or a well enchanted [[arbalest]]. Once you reach those near-max skill levels, however, there is little reason not to upgrade. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:triple_crossbow.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:triple_crossbow2.png]] |- ! || [[Unrandart]]
triple crossbow |- | '''[[Sniper]]''' || [[File:New sniper.png]] |} ==History== *In [[0.29]], stats of the triple crossbow were changed (damage from 22 to 23, accuracy from 0 to -2), and they were affected by the [[Ranged Weapons#History|ranged weapons rework]] that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [[Crossbows (skill)|crossbows skill]] and physical [[bolt]]s necessary to fire. [[Spriggan]]s also lost the ability to wield them. *Triple crossbows (as well as [[hand crossbow]]s and [[arbalest]]s) were added in [[0.15]], replacing vanilla [[crossbow (item)|crossbows]]. {{weapons}} [[Category:Crossbows]]
